body_html:
I think new environment is optional choice.
Since tensorflow has many dependencies, for example, numpy, pandas and so on, they might be upgraded when installing tensorflow. So it is safe to create a separate environment. If you don't care the case, feel free to install tensorflow in default environment.
body_text:
I think new environment is optional choice.
Since tensorflow has many dependencies, for example, numpy, pandas and so on, they might be upgraded when installing tensorflow. So it is safe to create a separate environment. If you don't care the case, feel free to install tensorflow in default environment.
body:
I think new environment is optional choice. 
Since tensorflow has many dependencies, for example, numpy, pandas and so on, they might be upgraded when installing tensorflow. So it is safe to create a separate environment. If you don't care the case, feel free to install tensorflow in default environment.
